---
title: IRestoreApi.restored_client_set_label method
---

Sets the label to send for requests to restored.

```csharp
public void restored_client_set_label(RestoreClientHandle client, string label)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| client | The restore client |
| label | The label to set or NULL to disable sending a label |
